title: college website
description: Developed a responsive college web page using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, AOS library for smooth animations, and Bootstrap for a mobile-friendly layout. The site includes sections like Home, Courses, and Contact, optimized for all devices. It was hosted on Netlify with version control managed through GitHub..

title: Photographer Website
description: For this project, I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, incorporating modern libraries to elevate the site's aesthetics and functionality. The result is a fast, secure, and scalable web experience built on JAMstack, featuring smooth scroll animations and interactive elements to enhance user engagement. Explore Niharika Visions to see how we've made this vision a reality! üé®üåê It was hosted on Netlify with version control managed through GitHub..
